Package com.mopub.common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CacheService.DiskLruCacheGetListener  
    CloseableLayout.OnCloseListener  
    DownloadTask.DownloadTaskListener  
    GpsHelper.GpsHelperListener  
    LifecycleListener
    This is a uniform interface to 3rd party SDKs that need to know when Activity lifecycle events occur.
    MediationSettings
    A marker interface for 3rd party SDK options.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdReport
    A value class used for generating reports to send data back to MoPub
    AdType
    Valid values for the "X-Adtype" header from the MoPub ad server.
    AdUrlGenerator  
    BaseLifecycleListener
    This empty implementation of LifecycleListener is convenient for writing your own adapters for an SDK that MoPub can mediate.
    BaseUrlGenerator  
    CacheService  
    ClientMetadata
    Singleton that caches Client objects so they will be available to background threads.
    CloseableLayout
    CloseableLayout provides a layout class that shows a close button, and allows setting a CloseableLayout.OnCloseListener.
    Constants  
    DataKeys
    Keys used in localExtras and serverExtras maps for MoPub custom events.
    DiskLruCache
    A cache that uses a bounded amount of space on a filesystem.
    DiskLruCacheUtil
    Junk drawer of utility methods.
    DownloadResponse  
    DownloadTask  
    GpsHelper  
    GpsHelper.AdvertisingInfo  
    HttpClient  
    HttpResponses  
    LocationService  
    MoPub  
    MoPubBrowser  
    MoPubLifecycleManager
    This class handles delegating lifecycle callback events to ads SDKs that require them.
    MoPubReward
    Represents a reward to the user for completing a rewarded task like watching a video.
    Preconditions
    Simple static methods to be called at the start of your own methods to verify correct arguments and state.
    Preconditions.NoThrow
    Preconditions checks that avoid throwing and exception in release mode.
    SharedPreferencesHelper

    An annotation that indicates that the visibility of a type or member has been relaxed to make the code testable.
